text:
@dougducey This is what we're reduced to. Instead of a process that delivers medical supplies based on a rational plan, we have Trump personally doling them out based on which states voted for him, which governors bow and praise Dear Leader in the most flowery terms.
https://t.co/dkItvqDNQk
